description: Communities and Institutions have established preparedness mechanisms and partnerships to effectively respond to and recover from the impact of disasters.

subproject.description: Support preparation and adoption of action plan for implementation disaster risk reduction programme at Centre, State and local levels in selected urban and rural locations.
subproject.title: Disaster Risk Reduction

subproject.description: The key element of the project involves settlement and habitat planning in the flood-affected Kosi region of Bihar, India, with a disaster risk reduction focus and setting up of rural hubs providing access to poor people who have lost their shelter by making available guidelines, technologies and more importantly material and choices for reconstruction of houses.
subproject.title: Flood Recovery & Reconstructio

subproject.description: The key element of the project involves settlement and habitat planning in the flood-affected Kosi region of Bihar, India, with a disaster risk reduction focus and setting up of rural hubs providing access to poor people who have lost their shelter by making available guidelines, technologies and more importantly material and choices for reconstruction of houses.
subproject.title: Flood Recovery & Reconstructio

subproject.description: The project will reach out to water scarce communities in 200 villages of Pali, Barner and Jodhpur districts of Rajasthan to address the water related vulnerabilities of the people.  The project will create water harvesting structures and capacities based on community participation and ownership.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Water and Livelihood Security
